id.label: id
id.computedValue: {{(() => { const tableData = Table1.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (currentRow["id"])) : id })()}}

service.label: service
service.computedValue: {{(() => { const tableData = Table1.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (currentRow["service"])) : service })()}}

severity.label: severity
severity.computedValue:
{{(() => { const tableData = Table1.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => ( 
  currentRow.severity === "Critical" ? "red" :
  currentRow.severity === "High" ? "orange" :
  currentRow.severity === "Medium" ? "gold" :
  "green"
)) :  
  currentRow.severity === "Critical" ? "red" :
  currentRow.severity === "High" ? "orange" :
  currentRow.severity === "Medium" ? "gold" :
  "green"
 })()}}
severity.buttonLabel:
{{(() => { const tableData = Table1.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => ( 
  currentRow.severity === "Critical" ? "red" :
  currentRow.severity === "High" ? "orange" :
  currentRow.severity === "Medium" ? "gold" :
  "green"
)) :  
  currentRow.severity === "Critical" ? "red" :
  currentRow.severity === "High" ? "orange" :
  currentRow.severity === "Medium" ? "gold" :
  "green"
 })()}}

timestamp.label: timestamp
timestamp.computedValue: {{(() => { const tableData = Table1.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (moment(currentRow.timestamp).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"))) : moment(currentRow.timestamp).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss") })()}}

actionConfiguration.body: SELECT COUNT(*) from mei.categorias where descricao ilike '%{{Table1.searchText}}%';
SELECT COUNT(*) from mei.categorias where descricao ilike '%{{Table1.searchText}}%';

SELECT
  *
FROM
  mei.categorias
WHERE
  "descricao" ilike '%{{Table1.searchText}}%'
ORDER BY
  "{{Table1.sortOrder.column || 'id_categoria'}}" {{Table1.sortOrder.order !== "desc" ? "" : "DESC"}}
LIMIT
  {{Table1.pageSize}}
OFFSET
  {{Table1.pageOffset}}

SELECT
  *
FROM
  mei.categorias
WHERE
  "descricao" ilike '%{{Table1.searchText}}%'
ORDER BY
  "{{Table1.sortOrder.column || 'id_categoria'}}" {{Table1.sortOrder.order !== "desc" ? "" : "DESC"}}
LIMIT
  {{Table1.pageSize}}
OFFSET
  {{Table1.pageOffset}}

unpublishedAction.name: getAlerts

publishedAction.name: getAlerts

actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE mei."categorias" SET
		"nome_categoria" = '{{update_form.fieldState.nome_categoria.isVisible ? update_form.formData.nome_categoria : update_form.sourceData.nome_categoria}}',
		"descricao" = '{{update_form.fieldState.descricao.isVisible ? update_form.formData.descricao : update_form.sourceData.descricao}}',
    "ativo" = '{{update_form.fieldState.ativo.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ativo : update_form.sourceData.ativo}}'
WHERE "id_categoria" = {{data_table.selectedRow.id_categoria}};

UPDATE mei."categorias" SET
		"nome_categoria" = '{{update_form.fieldState.nome_categoria.isVisible ? update_form.formData.nome_categoria : update_form.sourceData.nome_categoria}}',
		"descricao" = '{{update_form.fieldState.descricao.isVisible ? update_form.formData.descricao : update_form.sourceData.descricao}}',
    "ativo" = '{{update_form.fieldState.ativo.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ativo : update_form.sourceData.ativo}}'
WHERE "id_categoria" = {{data_table.selectedRow.id_categoria}};
